actions.name: Chlorofury

cost.trigger: The user gains this Ability, or the user joins combat.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user gains this Ability, or the user joins combat.

Effect: For every creature that is @Affliction[fainted] in the user's own Team, the user gains +1 SPATK and SPD Stages for 5 Activations.
